name: profiles
schema:
CREATE TABLE `profiles` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`version` text,
	`platform` text,
	`framework` text,
	`technology` text,
	`vendor` text,
	`organization` text,
	`team` text,
	`github` text,
	`details` text,
	`standard` text,
	`standard_version` text,
	`short_description` text,
	`requirements` text,
	`category` text,
	`created_at` integer NOT NULL,
	`last_updated` integer NOT NULL,
	`status` text DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (`technology`) REFERENCES `technologies`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`organization`) REFERENCES `organizations`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`team`) REFERENCES `teams`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`standard`) REFERENCES `standards`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)
